title: CI/COMPAT: Linux py37_np_dev pipeline timeouts
raw_output:
{'files_to_modify': ['pandas/io/sas/sas.pyx', 'ci/azure/posix.yml', 'ci/deps/azure-37-numpydev.yaml', 'pandas/io/sas/sas7bdat.py', 'pandas/io/sas/sasreader.py'], 'reasoning': "1. pandas/io/sas/sas.pyx: The Cython file is where the SAS parsing logic and problematic extension are implemented; updating any usage of 'tostring()' to 'tobytes()' prevents DeprecationWarnings and errors.
2. ci/azure/posix.yml: The Linux pipeline configuration; modifying error/warning handling or timeout controls mitigates pipeline timeouts caused by excessive warnings.
3. ci/deps/azure-37-numpydev.yaml: Sets the numpy version and environment for the affected pipeline—updating or pinning to a compatible version can resolve deprecation and prevent future breakage.
4. pandas/io/sas/sas7bdat.py: Handles SAS file processing and may propagate issues from extension code; update usages or catch deprecation warnings.
5. pandas/io/sas/sasreader.py: May interface with SAS extensions or expose methods calling deprecated functionality; should update or suppress warnings for robust error handling."}
